document.description: ... cevapcici in the heart of bascarsija in this small fast-food restaurant where you have to wait for a place to sit ... is too polite saying 'bujrum, bujrum, like 'go in, go in ...

Cevabdzinica Zeljo Restaurant Reviews, Sarajevo

Home > Europe > Bosnia and Herzegovina > Sarajevo > Sarajevo Restaurants > Cevabdzinica Zeljo
All 113 Sarajevo Restaurants» Cevabdzinica Zeljo Kundurdziluk (Bascarsija) , Sarajevo , Bosnia and Herzegovina 4 visitor photos Ranked #7 of 113 restaurants in Sarajevo 57 Reviews Price range: INR223 - INR391 Good for: Child-friendly, Local cuisine, Cheap Eats Dining options: Breakfast/Brunch, Lunch Spot, Breakfast/Brunch Restaurant details Good for: Child-friendly, Local cuisine, Cheap Eats Dining options: Breakfast/Brunch, Lunch Spot, Breakfast/Brunch Update restaurant details Write a Review 57 reviews from our community 82% Recommend Excellent 32 Very good 15 Average 8 Poor 1 Terrible 1 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 57 reviews sorted by Date Rating Danish first Dutch first English first French first German first Italian first Japanese first Any olliekemp92 Senior Reviewer 9 reviews Reviews in 2 cities “Don't believe the Hype.” Reviewed 6 July 2012 NEW via mobile Lauded as the best cevapi in town, it actually feels a little soulless and the food is very average- tastes a little manufactured. There is much better cevapi to be had, try Ferhatovic, near the great library. Excellent. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 7 more reviews by olliekemp92 for Sarajevo Allen F St-Remy-de-Provence, France 1 review “Lovely!” Reviewed 6 July 2012 NEW I was there with my girlfriend and we tried Cevapcici. It was delicious! We really enjoy it!You have to try Cevapcici when in Sarajevo. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? bella201 Reviewer 4 reviews “Must try!” Reviewed 6 July 2012 NEW via mobile Cevapcici are Bosnian fast food and they are very delicious and cheap.You cannot visit Sarajevo if you do not visit Zeljo and eat cevapcici. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 3 more reviews by bella201 for Sarajevo TiborBH Senior Reviewer 6 reviews Reviews in 2 cities 3 helpful votes “Excellent” Reviewed 4 July 2012 via mobile Everyone who comes to Sarajevo should try cevapcici. And the best place to do it is Zeljo. It is not a fancy restaurant with professional staff, but a typical family run place. It is just perfect place to eat Bosnian traditional food. An advice: don't ask for ketchup or mayonnaise! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 2 more reviews by TiborBH for Sarajevo Carbo1960 Belgrade, Serbia Senior Contributor 28 reviews Reviews in 9 cities 6 helpful votes “Cheap and tasty” Reviewed 1 July 2012 While wondering Baščaršija, don't hestate to stop at one of two premisses of this Bosnian-style fast food (both located in the same street paralel to Miljacka river, just behind the City of Sarajevo Museum). A filling portion of tasty mixed grilled meat will set you back for 7 EUR (bread, chopped onions and mustard included). Be prepaired to wait for... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 9 more reviews by Carbo1960 for Sarajevo wingcastles Turin, Italy Senior Contributor 22 reviews Reviews in 8 cities 4 helpful votes “Typical food” Reviewed 21 May 2012 Former Yugoslavia is a place to go if you're interested in recent history, not gourmet food. All the food comes from the octoman domination of the past (kebabm baklava, etc) but in this place downtown you can have a sort of wrap with beef sausages, cream sauce and onions that is very very filling and ridicolously cheap. Dont miss it! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 4 more reviews by wingcastles for Sarajevo Maja S Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina Contributor 11 reviews “Mass ćevapi” Reviewed 1 May 2012 It's ok and tasty, but you feel like you are in an assembly line in a car factory, you have to eat fast, drink fast, pay fast, because there are always people waiting for a table. Definitely a Bosnian fast food place. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 10 more reviews by Maja S for Sarajevo Foks M Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina Contributor 13 reviews Reviews in 2 cities 2 helpful votes “The best fast food in town” Reviewed 28 April 2012 Traditional Bosnian Fast food are Cevapcici, and this is the best pace to try them. If you like that king of food, I guarantee you, you will want to return for more…and more…and more. The service is excellent and you get the food in no time. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 10 more reviews by Foks M for Sarajevo Kristina B Mojstrana Senior Reviewer 6 reviews Reviews in 2 cities “Our first stop!” Reviewed 26 April 2012 It was our first visit to a restaurant when in Sarajevo and it certainly wasn't the last! Best cevapcici I have ever eaten! Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 4 more reviews by Kristina B for Sarajevo bosnom Luxembourg City, Luxembourg Senior Contributor 32 reviews Reviews in 11 cities 15 helpful votes “For tourists” Reviewed 24 April 2012 1 person found this review helpful The place enjoys a nice reputation, which is not justified, as there are many much better places serving this kind of food. It is mostly popular among non-connoisseurs as a matter of fact. However, in spite of being much over-rated, the food they are serving is decent, nothing to be ashamed of. One thing: You don't, ever, no matter the... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review?
